category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
GOD, MY ULTIMATE GOAL,

It is my greatest and best pleasure to know You,
and to understand my own mind and soul that will last forever.
It's a sweet and fulfilling thing to look inside myself
when all my energy and passion
are focused on pursuing You,
when my soul longs and passionately desires
to be more like You
and to find complete joy in You.
No hours are better than the ones I spend
connecting with You and my own heart.

O how good and helpful it is
to have a spirit that's spiritually alert
and fiercely protective of my own heart,
when my soul isn't afraid of anything
except grieving and offending You, my blessed God,
my Father and friend,
whom I love and long to please
more than I long to just make myself happy.

Knowing that this is the right attitude to have—
one that's worthy of my highest ambition and focus—
let my joy come from glorifying and delighting You.

I long to fill all my time for You,
whether I'm at home or on the go;
to place all my concerns in Your hands;
to be completely at Your disposal,
having no agenda of my own.

Help me to live for You forever,
to make You my one and only ultimate goal,
so that I'll never again choose to love my sinful self, not even for a moment.
